description:
Inside the house, the air is filled with the calming aroma of tasty tasty coffe.
And then you spot the biggest cup of coffe you've ever seen! Awesome!

Drink giant cup of coffe.description: You drink the entire cup and feel relieved.

Wait.description: Nice picture. Although I would prefere a picture of my lucky mug back at home.
Is this really the only room in this whole house?
You still can't stop being amazed over the hugeness of that coffe cup.
